Reduced Inequalities.reason: The course explores '國族意識和主體認同' (national consciousness and subject identity) and '譴責小說' (condemnation novels), which can involve critiques of social hierarchies and inequalities.

Sustainable Cities and Communities.reason: The course schedule includes '都市/狎邪小說' (urban/courtesan novels), which relates to urban life, but lacks any connection to sustainability.

Responsible Consumption and Production.reason: The syllabus explicitly instructs students to '維護智慧財產權，務必使用正版書籍' (Respect Copyright. Use legitimate books), promoting responsible consumption of intellectual products.

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: The course covers texts like '論小說與群治之關係' (On Fiction and Governance), '立憲萬歲' (Long Live the Constitution), and genres like '偵探小說,' which relate to justice and institutions.
